plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i "s/scrypt@v[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+/scrypt@v${nextRelease.version}/g" README.md && sed -i "s/[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]/${nextRelease.version}/" egg.json && sed -i "s/v[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]/v${nextRelease.version}/" lib/scrypt_bench.ts
